A few facts about #Cardano #staking:  - No minimum is defined. You can stake 1 $ADA. - You can delegate coins via Daedalus or Yoroi wallets. - Coins never leave wallets. You can always use them. - You get a reward every 5 days. - Rewards depend on the performance of pools.  https://t.co/OkwVVf93GL
